0.explain: Our hand has 0% equity. Betting offers villain 3:1 odds. To keep villain indifferent between calling and folding with a bluff catcher (a Q) we need to construct a betting range with 75% value and 25% bluffs. (Villain will be indifferent to calling with a Q if he only wins 25% of the time, getting 3:1 odds). When villain has a Q our range will be 50% J and 50% K, so we can bet K 100% and J 33% to maintain the 75/25 value/bluff ratio.

1.explain: With a mid strength hand vs villain's perfectly polar range we have a bluff catcher and therefore check 100%.

2.explain: Our hand has 100% equity. We bet 100% of the time, which also allows our bluffs to work at the maximum frequency.

0 pb.explain: We have 0% equity and do not have an option to bluff. We must fold 100%.

1 pb.explain: We have a bluff catcher vs villain's perfectly polar range. Getting 3:1 odds we call with the Minimum Defence Frequency of 67% to keep villain indifferent to bluffing us. We never have a King in this spot, and we fold 100% with a Jack, therefore we must call with a Queen the full 67%.

2 pb.explain: The probability of reaching this scenario is 0%. We never check with a King.

0 p.explain: Our hand has 0% equity. Betting offers villain 3:1 odds. To keep villain indifferent between calling and folding with a bluff catcher (a Q) we need to construct a betting range with 75% value and 25% bluffs. (Villain will be indifferent to calling with a Q if he only wins 25% of the time, getting 3:1 odds). When villain has a Q our range will be 50% J and 50% K, so we can bet K 100% and J 33% to maintain the 75/25 value/bluff ratio.

1 p.explain: The only hand villain checks is a Jack or a Queen. Since we have the Queen villain must have a Jack. We have 100% equity last to act so we always bet.

2 p.explain: We have 100% equity last to act so we always bet.

0 b.explain: We have 0% equity and can't bluff so we fold 100%.

1 b.explain: We have a bluff catcher vs villain's polar range. Getting 3:1 odds we call with the Minimum Defence Frequency of 67% to keep villain indifferent to bluffing us. When villain is bluffing, we have a K 50% and a Q 50% of the time. We call with a K 100%, and therefore call with a Q 33% to maintain the 67% MDF.

2 b.explain: We have 100% equity so we always call.
